title: Room for rent. US Travellers only. Vegan.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


I rent a room. The whole saloon with a double bed. Large space.
Sun and south orientation, two window. Hot shower and Wi-Fi !

 to relax if you need a stop and go night in Paris. 

Travelling from the USA through Paris...visiting Paris..

switching airports from CDG to Orly or trying to catch a plane or train next day.

One or two days max. If you want to stay few days in Paris to visit, we can discuss and chat on your travelling and staying project.

Appartement located in villa d Alésia, subway line 4.

From CDG take the suburb train RER blue line B up to Denfert Rochereau, south direction, then switch to subway line 4. 

From Orly,  just take the direct bus up to Denfert Rochereau or the Orly Val and then the RER B. 

Very calm street, of artists, cinema stars, writers and famous for the Matisse artist atelier in which the painter used to paint. Just in front.

Very high standing neighbor.

Open only for women. Travelling. vegan, vegetarian. Intellectual and artist.
